channel.title: VitaScape
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/cooltext653393497.png[/img][/center]
[B]What is VitaScape?[/b] [i]It is a literal RuneScape [b]REMAKE[/b], in other words I'm re-designing every skill(Exceptions for some combat skills). I thought about the idea when I was looking at a board for a remake, and when I saw "remake" I thought to myself, why doesn't anyone actually remake all the skills so that they are unique, and I searched for such a thing but didn't really find anything[/i]
[B]How is it different?[/b] [i]It can be little, or huge differences. One example would be the change of use of runes in magic, You no longer have to use runes to cast spells, But instead they will act as boosts.[/i]
[B]How can I help you?[/b] [i]Plain and simple. Ideas. It is very hard to come up with unique ideas in any way for most skills.[/i]
[B]Ideas will be posted as I go along.[/B] [center][size=18pt]Information[/size][/center]
Completed Started Not Started
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/combat.png[/img] [b]Attack | Strength | Defence | Hitpoints[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/combat.png[/img][list] [li]New weapon specials[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/magic.png[/img] [b]Magic[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/magic.png[/img] [list][li]Runes not used in magic combat[/li] [li]Runes boosting damage in combat[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/ranged.png[/img] [b]Ranged[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/ranged.png[/img] [list][li]Strength is a factor of how much damage is hit[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/prayer.png[/img] [B]Prayer[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/prayer.png[/img] [list][li]Effects if you can use holy items[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/cooking.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/cooking.png[/img] [list][li]Combinations for better chance of success[/li] [li]Seasonings for better chance of success[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/herblore.png[/img] [b]Herblore[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/herblore.png[/img] [list][li]Identifying herbs differently[/li] [li]Better use of mortar & pestle[/li] [li]Any ingredients can be mixed; Made into bad potions[/li][/list]
[img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/agility.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/agility.png[/img] [list][li]Effects the speed of attack[/li] [/list]
Please, if you are going to criticize my server, make it constructive so i can benefit from it.[/ul]

item.title: VitaScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:4, topic:434612”]The higher your smithing level, the stronger the weapon is. (Dull Steel Scimitar) (Steel Scimitar) (Perfect Steel Scimitar)

After a time, the weapon becomes a little dull (or not) and you have to sharpen it.[/quote]
Mabye, It is a good idea but it would be a real burden for players to have to keep sharpening their weapons.
But on the other hand it is a good idea because it adds a feel of realistic problems back in the time of these weapons made by blacksmiths that weren’t great at their job

I’ll think about this for a while

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

The higher your smithing level, the stronger the weapon is. (Dull Steel Scimitar) (Steel Scimitar) (Perfect Steel Scimitar)

After a time, the weapon becomes a little dull (or not) and you have to sharpen it.

item.title: VitaScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:2, topic:434612”]Max skill level, 150.

Perks so that you can attack quicker, take more damage, do more damage, etc.[/quote]
Attacking quicker is something interesting, It will be effected by Agility, but the other two are pretty much HP and Strength.

As for the Level cap, I was thinking of this since level 150 is 2033749558 experience, which is very close to the max number in java, which would be a real accomplishment.

Read full topic

item.title: VitaScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[ul][center][/center]

What is VitaScape? It is a literal RuneScape REMAKE, in other words I’m re-designing every skill(Exceptions for some combat skills). I thought about the idea when I was looking at a board for a remake, and when I saw “remake” I thought to myself, why doesn’t anyone actually remake all the skills so that they are unique, and I searched for such a thing but didn’t really find anything

How is it different? It can be little, or huge differences. One example would be the change of use of runes in magic, You no longer have to use runes to cast spells, But instead they will act as boosts.

How can I help you? Plain and simple. Ideas. It is very hard to come up with unique ideas in any way for most skills.

Ideas will be posted as I go along.
[center][size=18pt]Information[/size][/center]

Completed
Started
Not Started

Attack | Strength | Defence | Hitpoints [list]
[li]New weapon specials[/li][/list]

Magic
[list][li]Runes not used in magic combat[/li]
[li]Runes boosting damage in combat[/li][/list]

Ranged
[list][li]Strength is a factor of how much damage is hit[/li][/list]

Prayer
[list][li]Effects if you can use holy items[/li][/list]

Cooking
[list][li]Combinations for better chance of success[/li]
[li]Seasonings for better chance of success[/li][/list]

Herblore
[list][li]Identifying herbs differently[/li]
[li]Better use of mortar & pestle[/li]
[li]Any ingredients can be mixed; Made into bad potions[/li][/list]

Agility
[list][li]Effects the speed of attack[/li]
[/list]

Please, if you are going to criticize my server, make it constructive so i can benefit from it.[/ul]

Read full topic
